**Use pkgdown build_article with Quarto version 1.5+**

### YAML header text

``` yaml
title: "TITLE"
output: quarto::html_vignette
vignette: >
  %\VignetteIndexEntry{TITLE}
  %\VignetteEngine{quarto::html}
  %\VignetteEncoding{UTF-8}
```
